comments.html: Thank you for pointing out that this is still a thing. I learned about those hub/common/services networks during my early days as a network engineer running a MPLS network. Unfortunatly I've never seen it anywhere else, despite it being a really cool "trick". Thaught it a lot of other engineers who where learing about MPLS and BGP and it makes me happy seeing it's still alive with EVPN. Thank you.
comments.name: Daniel S
